Package crew

Class CrewMember

  • java.lang.Object
    • crew.CrewMember
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Engineer, Medic, Merchant, Pilot, Scientist, Soldier
    public class CrewMember
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a CrewMember object. These are the characters that are used to play the game and perform actions within the game. Each CrewMember has various attributes based on their class.
    Author:
    mch221

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates new CrewMember objects.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CrewMember

        public CrewMember​(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String type,
                  int damage,
                  double healthDegradation,
                  double hungerDegradation,
                  double tirednessDegradation,
                  java.lang.String classString,
                  java.lang.String imagePath)
        Creates new CrewMember objects.
        Parameters:
        name - takes a String representing the name string given by the player.
        type - takes a String representing the class of a CrewMember object.
        damage - takes an Integer for the damage output value.
        healthDegradation - takes a double with the health degradation multiplier.
        hungerDegradation - takes a double with the hunger degradation multiplier.
        tirednessDegradation - takes a double with the tiredness degradation multiplier.
        classString - takes a String containing a description of the CrewMember class.
        imagePath - takes a String containing a path to the class image.

      • setHealth

        public void setHealth​(double health)
        Sets the health variable of a CrewMember object. If the crew member has 0 health be removed from the crew at the end of the day.
        Parameters:
        health - takes a double with the new health value.

      • setHunger

        public void setHunger​(int hunger)
        Sets the hunger value of a CrewMember object.
        Parameters:
        hunger - takes an integer with a CrewMembers new hunger value.

      • setTiredness

        public void setTiredness​(int tiredness)
        Sets the tiredness variable of a CrewMember object. If the crew member has 0 tiredness they will lose their actions for the day.
        Parameters:
        tiredness - takes an integer with the new tiredness value.

      • setDiseaseStatus

        public void setDiseaseStatus​(boolean isDiseased)
        Sets the disease status variable of a CrewMember object.
        Parameters:
        isDiseased - takes a boolean value with the new disease status.

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage​(int damageTaken)
        Inflicts damage on a CrewMember object.
        Parameters:
        damageTaken - takes an integer with the damage amount.

        public void resetActionsPerformed()

      • useItem

        public void useItem​(FoodItem name)
        Uses an a food item on a CrewMember object.
        Parameters:
        name - takes a FoodItem to be used on the crew member.

      • useItem

        public void useItem​(MedicalItem name)
        Uses a medical item on a CrewMember object.
        Parameters:
        name - : takes a MedicalItem to be used on the crew member.

      • sleep

        public void sleep()
        Performs the sleep action for a CrewMember. Resets the tiredness variable, but removes the actions from that crew member for the current day.
